data.text:
@Reecek15 @CityNewsVAN Well the great thing about science is that it is based on peer reviewed studies, not personal anecdotes.
https://t.co/2JKkstjJGP

@big69foot69 Ohhh man. Looked at your page. You are one negative person. I feel bad for you.
Changing your outlook can improve your life.
Wishing you the best, but blocking you.
🙏

@sarahlavin13 @Reecek15 @CityNewsVAN Omicron has changed the game!  But our leaders are still, unable to keep up, being 3-4 months behind.  Wake up and look at the bigger picture. The impact of these mandates are killing people as well NOT mention on our children. So keep on being disingenous.

@Seawisp2 @big69foot69 @CityNewsVAN Covid, influenza, ammonia and other respiratory illnesses are never going away. 9 people per day × 365 = 3,285 deaths for the year and the majority of the deaths are in people who are ages 70+ and have preexisting health problems
@CityNewsVAN Out of touch with reality. Shameful!

@sarahlavin13 @CityNewsVAN I also call BS it’s 50% less likely to be transmitted since everyone I know is fully vaccinated and has tested positive including myself. It’s now turned into the common cold and our government needs to treat it like that. The fear mongering needs to stop and we have to live life
